bibl.title: Transcription of a telegram from Frederick F. Russell to Henry Hanson, April 2, 1923

div1.p: Russell asks if Hanson would accompany White on a yellow fever survey of Colombia.

div1.head: Transcription of a telegram from Frederick F. Russell to Henry Hanson, April 2, 1923
div1.p:
Pending more definite information concerning
conditions Doct r White wishes to know if you
could accompany him on yellow fever survey of
Columbia Lucian Smith also go date for starting
uncertain Wire if you consider offer and under
what conditions Stop. If development favorable
could you start soon
